text:
Ebates | Software Engineer | SF Bay Area

https://talent.rakuten.careers/ebates/jobs/software-engineer...

We're looking for talented software engineers for a new data processing\mining project. I wont go overboard with buzzwords but enough to say is that we're a small team based in the Bay Area and Tel Aviv, with a startup mentality and a cutting edge stack (GCP, Kubernetes, Python\JS, ...)
